name: Oberon Prime Access
detailed_description:
Get Oberon Prime Access now and make the newest Prime yours - instantly - including Oberon Prime, Silva & Aegis Prime, Sybaris Prime, and exclusive Customizations only available through Prime Access!

RECKONING BUNDLE
· 3990 Platinum
· Oberon Prime Warframe & Prime Glyphs
· Silva & Aegis Prime
· Sybaris Prime
· Prime Accessories Pack

RENEWAL BUNDLE
· 2625 Platinum
· Oberon Prime Warframe & Prime Glyphs
· Silva & Aegis Prime
· Sybaris Prime

SMITE BUNDLE
· 1050 Platinum
· Silva & Aegis Prime
· Sybaris Prime

PRIME ACCESSORIES PACK
· Sukira Prime Syandana
· Aroka Prime Sugatra
· 90 Day Credit & Affinity Booster

Oberon Prime, Silva & Aegis Prime, and Sybaris Prime can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.

short_description: Prime Access is a rotating program that includes the latest Prime Warframes and Prime Gear in bundles of discounted Platinum and other exclusive items. Prime Access offers instant access to the latest Prime Warframes and Prime Gear without requiring the build time.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
